column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I came over the weekend with my girlfriend. I got Tonkutsu Black HOT
column2: and it was great. Beware - HOT means HOT
column3: unlike most places in Houston. I haven't had much ramen in my life
column4: but I really enjoyed this. The atmosphere was very cool
column5: the wait staff was prompt and attentive
